ygData.subject: Re: combos I have tried for 'scuba gear'
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe you need to use bottles like in the spyglass to store the oxygen then a fastener and a metal rod so: Bottle Fastener shaft and some other things that I
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe you need to use bottles like in the spyglass to store the oxygen then
a fastener and a metal rod so:

Bottle
Fastener
shaft

and some other things that I can't think of
----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 11:16 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] combos I have tried for 'scuba gear'


> From: sragan@...
>
> These are failures...
>
> 1 Fastener
> 1 Fish Scale
> 1 Rod
> 1 Bolts
> 1 Gear
>
> -------------
> 1 Fastener
> 1 fish scale
> 1 Shaft
> 1 bolts
> 1 sprocket
>
> --------------
> 1 Fastener
> 1 fish scale
> 1 Rod
> 1 bolt
> 1 sprocket
>
> -------------
> 1 fastener
> 1 Fish scale
> 1 shaft
> 1 bolt
> 1 twine
>
>
>
> The series here is a combo of 5 with a fish scale,a fastener and 3 other
components.
> Help me finish this series out by trying some of the other components at
the mills and letting folks here know
> what you have failed on. I have reason to believe this is close to the
'scuba gear' recipe
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz" of tunare
>
> >
